court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR
outcome: IN CC NO.558/2019 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -V, KOZHIKODE CRIME NO.769/2018 OF NALLALAM POLICE STATION, KOZHIKODE PETITIONERS/ACCUSED NO. 1 TO 4: 1 BAIJU.E, AGED 32 YEARS, S/O VISWANATHAN
full_text: neue ents ci} =F a 2020/KER/672 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE P.B.SURESH KUMAR WEDNESDAY, THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 18TH POUSHA, 1941 Crl.MC.No.85 OF 2020(A) AGAINST THE ORDER IN CC NO.558/2019 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -V, KOZHIKODE CRIME NO.769/2018 OF NALLALAM POLICE STATION, KOZHIKODE PETITIONERS/ACCUSED NO. 1 TO 4: 1 BAIJU.E, AGED 32 YEARS, S/O VISWANATHAN EDOLI, POYILTHAZHAM, NALLALAM, KOZHIKODE-673 027. 2 VISWANATHAN, AGED 61 YEARS, S/O RAVUNNI KURUPATH, EDOLI, POYILTHAZHAM, NALLALAM, KOZHIKODE-673 027. 3 DEVAKI, AGED 56 YEARS, W/O VISWANATHAN, EDOLI, POYILTHAZHAM, NALLALAM, KOZHIKODE-673 027. 4 PRIYA, AGED 30 YEARS, W/O BIJEESH, EDOLI, POYILTHAZHAM, NALLALAM, KOZHIKODE-673 027. BY ADV. SRI.P.B.SAJITH RESPONDENTS/DE-FACTO COMPLAINANT & STATE: 1 ASWATHI.T.P, AGED 25 YEARS, D/O SIVADASAN, THAZHEPALLATH, THAYYILTHAZHAM, PERUMANNA, NALLALAM, KOZHIKODE-673 027. 2 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682 031. R1 BY ADV. R.SUDHISH SRI. T.R. RENJITH PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Cheers ae eis, 2020/KER/672 Crl.M.C. No.85 of 2020 2 Cri.M.C.No.85 of 2020 ORDER This is a proceedings instituted under Section 482 of the Code of Criminal Procedure for quashing Annexure - A5 final report and all further proceedings pursuant thereto now pending as C.C.No.558 of 2019 on the files of the Court of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class - V, Kozhikode. 2. The petitioners are accused in the said case. The case referred to above is one instituted at the instance of the first respondent against the petitioners under Sections 406 and 498A of the Indian Penal Code. 3. It is seen that the first respondent had settled her disputes with the petitioners and an affidavit to that effect has been produced as Annexure A7. 4. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners, the learned Public Prosecutor as also the learned counsel for the first respondent. 5. In the light of the decision of the Apex Court in Deere 2020/KER/672 Crl.M.C. No.85 of 2020 3 Gian singh v. State of Punjab, (2012) 10 SCC 303, insofar as the offences alleged against the accused in the case are only offences punishable under Sections 406 and 498A of the Indian Penal Code, | am of the view that this is an appropriate case where this court has to invoke the jurisdiction under Section 482 of the Code of Criminal Procedure to quash the proceedings against the petitioners. In the result, the Crl.M.C. is allowed and Annexure-A5 final report and all further proceedings pursuant thereto against the petitioners pending as C.C.No.558 of 2019 on the files of the Court of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class - V, Kozhikode are quashed. Sd/- P.B.SURESH KUMAR, JUDGE. YKB neue ee en ape 2020/KER/672 Crl.M.C. No.85 of 2020 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al CERTIFIED COPY OF FIRST INFORMATION REPORT IN CRIME NO 769/2018 OF NALLALAM POLICE DATED 27.12.2018 ANNEXURE A2 CERTIFIED COPY OF FIRST INFORMATION STATEMENT IN CRIME NO 769/2018 OF NALLALAM POLICE DATED 27.12.2018 ANNEXURE A3 CERTIFIED COPY OF MEMORANDUM OF EVIDENCE IN CRIME NO 769/2019 OF NALLALAM POLICE STATION ANNEXURE A4 CERTIFIED COPY OF STATEMENT OF WITNESSES UNDER SECTION 162 OF THE CODE OF CRIMINAL PROCEDURE IN CRIME NO 769/2018 OF NALLALAM POLICE STATION ANNEXURE A5 CERTIFIED COPY OF FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO 769/2018 OF NALLAM POLICE STATION DATED 17.4.2019 ANNEXURE A6 TRUE COPY AGREEMENT EXECUTED BETWEEN THE 1ST PETITIONER AND THE 1ST RESPONDENT DATED 29.5.2019 ANNEXURE A7 ORIGINAL OF THE AFFIDAVIT FILED BY THE 1ST RESPONDENT DATED 18.11.2019 RESPONDENT'S/S EXHIBITS: NIL //TRUE COPY// PA TO JUDGE
